com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

Class NCMBException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NCMBException
extends java.lang.Exception
    NCMBException is a class that defines the error to be returened from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
